title: Blue cheese dressing

For the dressing: 50g/1¾oz blue cheese, crumbled (keep some aside to scatter over the endive leaves)
2 tbsp white wine vinegar or cider vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper, to season

steps: Process all the dressing ingredients together in a food processor, adding just enough lemon juice to sharpen up the flavour.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Toss the endive leaves in the dressing, and serve.
